hero.subtitle: I build things for the web.
hero.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer focused on building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications that prioritize performance and accessibility.

about.title: Crafting digital experiences with purpose
about.p1: Hello! I'm Abderrahmane, a full-stack developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. My journey in web development began with a curiosity for how things work on the internet, which quickly evolved into a career of building complex systems.
about.p2: I specialize in building responsive, accessible, and performant web applications using modern technologies. My focus is on creating intuitive interfaces that solve real problems while providing delightful user experiences.
about.p3: I believe in clean code, thoughtful design, and a user-centric approach to every project I undertake.

skills.title: Technical Proficiencies
skills.description: A comprehensive toolkit for modern web development, from frontend aesthetics to backend stability.

items.react: Building dynamic and responsive user interfaces with modern React patterns and hooks
items.typescript: Developing type-safe applications with enhanced code quality and better developer experience
items.nextjs: Creating server-rendered React applications with optimal performance and SEO
items.tailwindcss: Building modern, responsive layouts with utility-first CSS framework
items.nodejs: Developing scalable server-side applications and RESTful APIs
items.express: Building robust web applications and APIs with minimal and flexible Node.js framework
items.python: Writing efficient backend services and automation scripts
items.mongodb: Designing and managing NoSQL databases with flexible document models
items.postgresql: Working with relational databases and complex SQL queries
items.firebase: Implementing real-time databases and authentication services
items.git: Version control and collaborative development workflows
items.docker: Containerizing applications for consistent development and deployment
items.aws: Deploying and managing cloud infrastructure and services
items.figma: Creating and collaborating on UI/UX designs and prototypes
items.jest: Writing comprehensive unit and integration tests
items.mocha: Feature-rich JavaScript test framework running on Node.js and in the browser
items.chai: BDD/TDD assertion library for Node.js and browser that pairs well with any testing framework
items.supertest: HTTP assertion library for testing Node.js HTTP servers with a fluent API

projects.title: Selected Works
projects.description: A collection of projects that demonstrate my ability to solve complex problems with elegant solutions.

clinicflow.title: ClinicFlow
clinicflow.desc: An intelligent healthcare management system designed to streamline patient care, appointment scheduling, and wellness tracking with a focus on ease of use.

logix.title: Logix
logix.desc: A comprehensive logistics and fleet management platform providing real-time data analytics, maintenance alerts, and cost optimization for modern transport operations.

devnest.title: DevNest
devnest.desc: An innovative ecosystem for developers to showcase their technical expertise through premium, high-performance portfolios and collaborative code spaces.

packages.title: Featured Library

harmony.title: Harmony UI
harmony.desc: A premium, modular React UI library designed for high-performance and accessibility-first applications. Built with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion.

footer.bio_short: Designing and developing robust, user-centric applications from Casablanca with a passion for innovation.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always looking for new opportunities and interesting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
contact.availability_text: I am currently looking for new opportunities as a Full Stack or Frontend Developer. My inbox is always open!
